Largely unknown historian @ Uni Kassel Versität. Works on Disney, TV, queer history. Frustrated idealist. Wonderfully verbal.

Techie, public historian, and activist from Berkeley, California, back from #XOXOFest.

I curate the monthly Berkeley South Asian radical history walking tour — now celebrating its 12th year.
